posts.author: HomebrewHero
posts.content:
My DM interprets Dispel differently than the rules as written. How do you all handle this at your tables?

I think the 2024 changes to Dispel make it much more balanced compared to before.

I've been playing a Human Ranger in my campaign, and I've noticed that Dispel really impacts how effective the character is in combat.

I actually disagree with some of the previous comments about Dispel. Based on my experience, it works differently.

In my campaign, we had a situation with Dispel that played out really well. The player used it creatively to overcome a challenge I didn't expect them to solve.
